title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Hiking & Backpacking Guides
body: Hiking & Backpacking Guides         Guide services can lead you into spectacular places   Alaska Alpine Adventures (877) 525-2577 www.alaskaalpineadventures.com  Alaskan Wilderness Guides (907) 345-4470 www.akwild.com Arctic Wild (888) 577-8203 www.arcticwild.com Expeditions Alaska (770) 952-4549 www.expeditionsalaska.com Get Up and Go! Tours (907) 245-0795 www.getupandgotours.com  Kennicott Wilderness Guides (907) 554-4444 www.kennicottguides.com McCarthy Mountain Guides (907) 227-0122 Pangaea Adventures (907) 835-8442 www.alaskasummer.com Reiseagentur Brandner (website is in German) www.reiseagentur-brandner.de Sierra Club (415) 977-5690 www.sierraclub.org St. Elias Alpine Guides (907) 554-4445 www.steliasguides.com Sun Valley Trekking (208) 788-1966 www.svtrek.com Trek Alaska (907) 554-1088 www.trekalaska.com Trek Expeditions (276) 706-0588 www.trekexpeditions.net Ultima Thule Outfitters (907) 854-4500 www.ultimathulelodge.com Wilderness Ventures (307) 733-2122 www.wildernessventures.com Wrangell Outfitters, Inc. (724) 427-5350 www.wrangelloutfitters.com  Â    These listings are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve.
